entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
